cards.title: Say something nice to your partner
cards.description: Tell your partner(s) you like them, love them, adore them, or hate them less than anyone else!
cards.reasoning: If you do this, it will make you happy.

cards.title: Go for a walk today
cards.description: Arrange your schedule in a way that you can get our for an hour today. If you have the stamina, go for a run. If not, go for a walk. Enjoy fresh air.
cards.reasoning: Moving your body is proven to improve your mood and abilities.
